ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
Freva (Free Evaluation System Framework) is a comprehensive platform
designed to support researchers, especially in the atmospheric and climate
science communities, in managing, searching, and analyzing large-scale
datasets. It bridges the gap between data centers and user-defined tools,
promoting efficient, reproducible, and collaborative research workflows.
about.summary: Search for climate data based on key-value pairs

about.description:
Freva (Free Evaluation System Framework) is a comprehensive platform
designed to support researchers, especially in the atmospheric and climate
science communities, in managing, searching, and analyzing large-scale
datasets. It bridges the gap between data centers and user-defined tools,
promoting efficient, reproducible, and collaborative research workflows.
about.summary: Search for climate data based on key-value pairs

name: freva-client
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "freva-client" %}
{% set version = "2511.0.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/freva_client-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 10a5c3dc2be9dec7b180c433f06642ba12a1a51ae7e1424b2f824271fc7f09a9

build:
  entry_points:
    - freva-client = freva_client:cli.app
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - flit-core >=3.2
    - appdirs
    - pip
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - appdirs
    - pyyaml
    - requests
    - intake-esm
    - rich
    - setuptools
    - tomli
    - typer

test:
  imports:
    - freva_client
  commands:
    - pip check
    - freva-client --help
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip

about:
  summary: Search for climate data based on key-value pairs
  dev_url: https://github.com/FREVA-CLINT/freva-nextgen/
  home: https://github.com/FREVA-CLINT/freva-nextgen
  description: |
    Freva (Free Evaluation System Framework) is a comprehensive platform
    designed to support researchers, especially in the atmospheric and climate
    science communities, in managing, searching, and analyzing large-scale
    datasets. It bridges the gap between data centers and user-defined tools,
    promoting efficient, reproducible, and collaborative research workflows.
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_file:
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - antarcticrainforest
    - mo-dkrz
